title: Game crashes after champ select every time, and will not get into loading screen
body:
Game crashes after champ select every time, and will not get into loading screen

anyone else having this issue? i dont want to try and play again and have leaver rack up on my accont

EDIT: i have tried a full repair, i have tried editing my firewall settings and disabling my firewall, and have sent a ticket to riot but with no suprise i havent receved a response, although they claim to be receving high volume of request which every support department in history has claimed since the beginning for time

replies.body: Exactly what happens when the game "crashes"? Do any dialogues appear with an error message?

Please help me,  I have the same problem! I can't even open normal games and I have tried almost everything to fix it.

This has just cost me being banned and 2 promo games thus meaning a promo series
nothing, it just goes to the image i posted

Please use the "Reply" feature of the boards to reply to someone; otherwise they won't get notification.

Try disabling any firewalls/anti-viruses you may have enabled on your system, and then try again in admin mode.
this happens to me too every game in every champion select i can't reach the loading screen.

Does this happen every single game, or just some of the time?
Also, What ISP are you with?
can confirm this is happening to me too riot pl0x help

It also occurs to me, has been at least for an hour or so then works fine again. But in my opinion is just to leave it because that is what I have been doing because it has been only thing that has been working. But someone with the proper know how might have a better answer if all thus fails
